ai-iti86:1.1_0: This was said by the Buddha, the Perfected One: that is what I heard.
ai-iti86:2.1_0: “Regarding a mendicant practicing in line with the teaching, it is in line with the teaching to declare that
ai-iti86:2.2_0: this is what it means to practice in line with the teaching. When speaking, they speak in line with the teaching, not against it. When thinking, they think in line with the teaching, not against it. And rejecting both, they meditate staying equanimous, mindful and aware.”
ai-iti86:2.3_0: That is what the Buddha said.
ai-iti86:3.1_0: “Delighting in the teaching, enjoying the teaching,
ai-iti86:3.3_0: a mendicant who recollects the teaching
ai-iti86:3.4_0: doesn’t decline in the true teaching.”
ai-iti86:5.1_0: This too was spoken by the Blessed One: that is what I heard.
